articles.author: Naomi O’Leary
articles.title: Europe's right-wing forces suffer blow in two crucial elections - The Irish Times
articles.description: Analysis: Results in France and Slovenia show threat of populism not as strong as feared
articles.content:
The results of two crucial elections this weekend in France and Slovenia are a blow to a camp of right-wing forces with authoritarian tendencies that once looked set to deadlock the European Union.

articles.title: The true cost of chickenpox: At least £24 million in lost productivity a year in the UK - Medical Xpress
articles.description: Chickenpox in childhood results in £24 million in lost income and productivity every year in the UK, although the true cost is likely to be higher, according to new research to be presented at this year's European Congress of Clinical Microbiology & Infectiou…
